member.name: ITransferDestination.Advise
member.summary: Sets up an advisory connection for notifications on the status of file operations.
member.param: A pointer to an notification interface to update the calling application using methods on this interface.

A pointer to a returned token that uniquely identifies this connection. The calling application uses this token later to delete the connection by passing it to the method. If the connection is not successfully established, this value is zero.

returns.para: Any HRESULTs other than listed indicate a failure.

listheader.description: The handler can only handle one sink interface.

member.name: ITransferDestination.CreateItem
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated buffer that contains the name of the file relative to the current directory.
One or more of the FILE_ATTRIBUTE flags defined in the structure. The most significant value is FILE_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTORY, which indicates that a folder should be created.
The size, in bytes, of the file to create. This value can be 0 if the size is unknown.
Flags that control the file operation. One or more of the flags.
A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through ppvItem, typically IID_IShellItem or another interface that derives from it.
When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riidItem. This is typically or a derived interface.
A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through ppvResources, typically IID_IShellItemResources or another interface that derives from it.
When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riidResources. This is typically or a derived interface.

returns.para: Returns a success code if successful, or an error value otherwise. Success codes include:

item.description: S_OK: The move succeeded and ppvItem and ppvResources both point to valid objects.

COPYENGINE_S_USER_IGNORED: The destination item already exists and has not been overwritten. The values pointed to by ppvItem and ppvResources are NULL. If the caller is implementing a move as a copy and delete operation, the caller should complete the move by deleting the source item.

member.name: ITransferDestination
member.summary: Exposes methods that create a destination Shell item for a copy or move operation. This interface is provided to allow more control over file operations by providing an method.
